recommendations: Jay R Vasavada “I brought in by shivangi 4 years ago to help them implement a new HR software platform. I found her to be highly cooperative and responsive. She set the strategy, handled the project timeline and was extremely valuable to both us to a successful outcome. I found her to be amenable, adaptable and witnessed her interaction with her team and was impressed with those as well. I look forward to working with her again in the future and highly recommend her for HR role.”

LinkedIn User “Shivangi Pandey is a committed professional. She is a go-to person for taking advice on HR and its related dynamics. She is both a people-driven leader and an effective team player. I wish her all the best in all her current and future initiatives.”
